00104     template<class Archive>
00105     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00106     {
00107         mpTissueConfig = TissueConfig::Instance();
00108         archive & *mpTissueConfig;
00109         archive & mpTissueConfig;
00110         archive & mWntType;
00111         archive & mpTissue;
00112         archive & mTypeSet;
00113         archive & mConstantWntValueForTesting;
00114         archive & mUseConstantWntValueForTesting;
00115     }
